description: Numbers n such that base 2 representation Sum{d(i)*2^(m-i): i=0,1,...,m} has d(i)=0 for all odd i, excluding 0. Here m is the position of the leading bit of n.
comments: Essentially the same as A126684. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 15 2008A126684 is the primary entry for this sequence. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 30 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
